title: 40: Living in Smaller Homes
description: How much space is too much space? Can we live in less? Laura and Larry discuss the need for living larger and one contractor’s quest to make smaller functional.
itunes:subtitle: How much space is too much space? Can we live in less? Laura and Larry discuss the need for living larger and one contractor’s quest to make smaller functional.
